title: $10 RP Giveaway - Most servers allowed! (Asides Garena/KR)
body:
Hello everybody! It's been awhile since I last posted on a League of Legends board and seeing how it's the holidays -I'm doing a $10 RP giveaway.

Winner will be chosen at random from the comment section on here on Sunday, December 24th. I used to do giveaways every week or so but seeing how life as a college student was rough - I had to stop the giveaways after 2 years. I think I gave out over $500 in RP and skins throughout that time. I have the cards laying around somewhere in my closet.

I have a previous post from the old boards that shows i'm legit, in case anyone thought this giveaway was weird or a scam.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=3841876&highlight=harrywhat

Happy Holidays everyone and good luck! :)
